mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.customer_code, #{customerName} as customerName, t.book_balance, t.unit_price, t.material_count, t.material_balance, t.pay_balance, t.pay_type, t.return_balance, t.is_default, t.operator_by, u2.user_name AS operatorByName, t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM customer_pay_detail t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.operator_by where t.customer_code = #{customerCode} order by t.id asc limit #{pageable.offset}, #{pageable.pageSize}
SELECT count(1) FROM customer_pay_detail t where t.customer_code = #{customerCode}

select t.id, t.customer_code, t.book_balance, t.pay_balance, t.pay_type, t.return_balance, t.is_default, t.remark from customer_pay_detail t where t.customer_code = #{customerCode} order by t.id desc limit 0,1
mapper.update: update customer_pay_detail set book_balance = book_balance - #{amount} where id > #{id}
update customer_pay_detail set book_balance = book_balance + #{amount} where id > #{id}
